pr_title: Fix DLP inspect tests to fail on timeout

timeline.bodyText: It's actually best to throw the most specific exceptions so that users understand and can mitigate what's going on.  That said, in a test, this is less important.
timeline.author: lesv

timeline.bodyText: Why did you reduce the throws here?
timeline.author: lesv

replies.bodyText:
It seemed unnecessarily verbose.
I was trying to follow the guidance in https://engdoc.corp.google.com/eng/doc/devguide/java/practices/exceptions.md?cl=head#test_methods.
Tests are currently inconsistent in how they handle this but given the above, I wanted to move towards the simpler throws Exception.
replies.author: sushicw
